lead_paragraph: PRESENT--Daniel, M.D. The volunteers and staff of the Crohn's & Colitis Foundation of America joins the IBD community in mourning the passing of Daniel Present, M.D., founder of the Foundation for Clinical Research in Inflammatory Bowel Disease at Mount Sinai. Dr. Present was a brilliant clinician who touched and improved the lives of thousands of patients living with Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis during his 50 years of medical practice. Our sincere condolences to his family. 1/3
